title: Renowned Economist Paul Krugman Says Joe Biden Should Be ‘Boasting’ About Recent ‘Extremely Good’ News About U.S. Economy
description: In a thought-provoking social media thread on platform X (formerly known as Twitter) on 10 February 2024, Paul Krugman dissected the current economic climate, suggesting that President Biden should openly celebrate recent economic successes. Krugman’s commentary sheds light on the complex interplay between economic data, public perception, and political partisanship. Krugman, an eminent economist and […]
